\pard\cf1\f0\fs24\lang1033 ###Turkey. Time\par
\par
#\f1\lang1049\'f1\'eb\'ee\'e2\'ee - \'e7\'ed\'e0\'f7\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e51, \'e7\'ed\'e0\'f7\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e52... \'e7\'ed\'e0\'f7\'e5\'ed\'e8\'e5\f0\lang1033 N.\par
\f2\lang1055 sonra\f0\lang1033  - later, after, then.\par
\f2\lang1055 her\f0\lang1033  - every, all, each.\par
ge\'e7e - past.\par
\'e7eyrek - quarter.\par
\f2\lang1055 bu\f0\lang1033\'e7\f2\lang1055 uk\f0\lang1033  - half.\par
\par
D\'f6rt bu\'e7ukta g\'f6r\'fc\f3\'ba\f0\'fcr\'fcz! See you at half past four.\par
Bir saat sonra randevum var. I have an appointment in an hour.\par
Saat birde \'f6\f3\u287?le yeme\u287?i yiyorum.\f0  I am eating lunch at one o'clock.\par
\f1\lang1049 Yediye yirmi var.\f0\lang1033  It is twenty to seven.\par
Yediye on kala. At ten to seven.\par
Saat ka\'e7ta? At what time?\par
Ak\f3\'baam yeme\u287?i saat ka\f0\'e7ta? What time is the dinner?\par
O her g\'fcn bire \'e7eyrek kala elma yer. He eats an apple every day at quarter to one.\par
Kediler yediyi \'e7eyrek ge\'e7e s\'fct i\'e7er. The cats drink milk at a quarter past seven.\par
Saat ka\'e7ta gidiyoruz? What time are we going?\par
Be\f3\'bai be\'ba ge\f0\'e7iyor. It is five past five.\par
\f2\lang1055 Be\f3\'ba\f2 i on ge\f0\lang1033\'e7\f2\lang1055 e burada ol. Be here at ten past five!\par
Be\f3\'baten sonra g\f0\lang1033\'f6r\'fc\f3\'ba\f0\'fcr\'fcz.\f2\lang1055  See you after five.\par
Saat iki bu\f0\lang1033\'e7uk.\f2\lang1055  It is half past two.\par
\f1\lang1049 Alt\f3\u305? bu\f0\lang1033\'e7uktan sonra gel! Come after half past six!\par
Biri on sekiz ge\'e7e eve gel! Come home at eighteen past one!\par
Be\f3\'bate postanede ol!\f0  Be at the post office at five!\par
Be\f3\'bae yirmi var.\f0  It is twenty to five.\par
\par
\par
\f1\lang1049\par
}
TxtContent:
###Turkey. Time

#слово - значение1, значение2... значениеN.
sonra - later, after, then.
her - every, all, each.
geçe - past.
çeyrek - quarter.
buçuk - half.

Dört buçukta görüşürüz! See you at half past four.
Bir saat sonra randevum var. I have an appointment in an hour.
Saat birde öğle yemeği yiyorum. I am eating lunch at one o'clock.
Yediye yirmi var. It is twenty to seven.
Yediye on kala. At ten to seven.
Saat kaçta? At what time?
Akşam yemeği saat kaçta? What time is the dinner?
O her gün bire çeyrek kala elma yer. He eats an apple every day at quarter to one.
Kediler yediyi çeyrek geçe süt içer. The cats drink milk at a quarter past seven.
Saat kaçta gidiyoruz? What time are we going?
Beşi beş geçiyor. It is five past five.
Beşi on geçe burada ol. Be here at ten past five!
Beşten sonra görüşürüz. See you after five.
Saat iki buçuk. It is half past two.
Altı buçuktan sonra gel! Come after half past six!
Biri on sekiz geçe eve gel! Come home at eighteen past one!
Beşte postanede ol! Be at the post office at five!
Beşe yirmi var. It is twenty to five.
